It is astounding to hear from the masses of cowardly and lazy whites, that proclaim some excuse for them to not migrate to the blessed Pacific Northwest.
Surely, it is here, of all places, that we can call "God's Country".
As the rest of the country turns brown the Homeland remains green.

It is important to remember that your struggle is always as important as the rest of your people. The salvation of the white race will never "just get done" or by someone else. Action always starts with you and your will to power. Join the New Awakening and mold that action into the spear that will drive our destiny!

You're assuming that National Socialism means using other people's money as it would in communism but that's false. The "socialism" in National Socialism means putting the race first, before all else. Whether or not you're taxed some amount is so unbelievably unimportant that it's not even on my radar.

Too much energy is wasted on bitterness toward fearful people who abandon us to a life of constant struggle. Never forget how much they have to lose. We're here not because of some miracle of intelligence or divine will, be humble. It's our job to grit our teeth and accept the burden of building an organization that can offer more.
Cloudy days are for white people.
